vWashington House Rabbit Newsv

Volume 6 Issue 4 December 1997

Veterinarians that truly care...

HRS is very fortunate to have the following outstanding veterinarians donate their time and services to the Hare Transplant Operation.

We wish to thank:

Dr. Cindy Bishop
Sno-Wood Veterinary Hospital
Woodinville

Dr. Evelyn Bitner
Humane Society of Seattle/King County

Dr. Barbara Deeb
Allpet Veterinary Hospital
Shoreline

Dr. Kim Martin
Steamboat Animal Hosptial
Olympia

Dr. Diane Mitchell
Sno-Wood Veterinary Hospital
Woodinville
